class.name: rviz_plugin_selected_points_publisher/SelectedPointsPublisher
class.description:
Drag with the left button to select objects in the 3D scene. Hold the Alt key to change viewpoint as in the Move tool. Holding the Shift key will allow adding to the current selection. Holding the Ctrl key will allow subtraction from the current selection. The following keys are also available:
'p' - Publish selected points to /rviz_selected_points 'b' - Publish selected points to /rviz_selected_border_points 'r' - Publish selected points to /rviz_selected_remove_points 'c' - Publish selected points to /rviz_selected_clear_all_points
